w1.title: Build Your Own Drone
w1.desc: Airshow, Simulator, Flight Training, Live demos and much more!
w1.long_desc:
1. Drone workshop
2. Logo launch using Drones
3. Airshow
4. Simulator practice
5. Flight Training

7. Live demonstration on Heavy lifting drones

w2.title: Learn Fusion 360
w2.desc: Unify design, engineering, electronics and manufacturing with Fusion 360
w2.long_desc: Fusion 360 software is required to design 3D parts. It is the easy to learn, yet can be used to draw the most complicated models

w3.title: Intro to ROS
w3.desc: Learn to simulate and build robots using Robot Operating System
w3.long_desc: Robot Operating System is an open-source robotics middleware suite used to make / simulate complex robots and test out Robotics algorithms without the need of much know-how on the algorithms behind because of which we can focus more on the implementation and application side. Even though ROS helps us to implement and simulate complex algorithms, It has a steep learning curve. With this Workshop I plan to provide a basic introduction on what ROS is and how to start making robots with ROS. The workshop will also include a handson session on working with a simulator called turtlesim with which the basics of ROS can be learned. I will also be demoing a ROS based Autonomous Navigation Robot built by me to further give clarity on the learned concepts.
